website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some issues, they provide nice insulation. Their odor may be a dealbreaker for sensitive consumers.
pros: Owners rave about both their room darkening ability and durable material
Insulation also helps keep rooms cool in the summer and warm in the winter
Available in a variety of colors
cons: Some reports of incorrect measurements and of a strange odor upon arrival
Some colors look different in person than advertised

customer_reviews.title: Awesome curtains
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the fabric and stitching is awesome especially when you consider the price! The blackout quality is fantastic I am extremely happy with these curtains. I'm including a photo to show at the blackout ability, on the left are the new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Not Blackout, inconsistent and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Not blackout! It's hard to tell from the pictures but there are patches of the curtain where the light shines through. The material of the curtain has no backing, and seems to be inconsistent and poorly made. The thickness of the curtain is patchy causing some sections to let light through. I work nights and needed a curtain that is completely black out, this was not it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great room darkening curtains for a low price
customer_reviews.text: These curtains do just what they're supposed to do, keep out the light. I was skeptical because of the price but I was pleasantly surprised. I ordered the long curtains, in black, for my bedroom so my husband could sleep during the day easier (night shift) and the first day they were up he slept much better! If you're looking for absolute blackness, these come about as close as you can get for the money you spend.
customer_reviews.author: Im_an_OSUbeaverfan

customer_reviews.title: Aaagh! (And a tip)
customer_reviews.text: For room darkening, these are incredible. I carefully measured and installed my curtain rod. Aaargh! Did I measure incorrectly? Why are they hanging an inch above the window sill? Hmmm. Took the tape measure and measured the drapes - 62", well, except for one side of one curtain, which is 62 1/2". Frustrating. Having trouble rating this, they work as they should to darken the room and the fabric looks nice and drapes beautifully. Still, two stars off for the length discrepancy. Tip: measure the drapes before hanging them and if they're not 63", adjust your rod placement (which I did) or request an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: Length Is Not What It’s Supposed To Be!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these. After painstakingly ironing out every little crease and wrinkle from packaging, I proceeded to hang them. I’ll admit they did do a wonderful job of blocking the sunlight. I had to turn on the light to see how they looked hanging, which was when I discovered that they were several inches shorter than the 84” sheers that they were hung with. So, back down they came, at which point I measured them. 81 inches long, not the stated 84”. Will not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The material is very nice and soft. These shouldn't be advertised as "thermal insulated blackout" in my opinion. Thermal insulated to me would mean they have a barrier of some sort. These are plain material. They're not blackout but they do the job. This picture is of a south facing window at around 1pm on a sunny day. My biggest complain is they are not 84" as advertised. They are 81" so I had to hang them lower than what I wanted. Also, one curtain out of a package had one side that was 80". Disappointing to say the least. For the money they're decent with a nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Really satisfied with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed heavy (room darkening/blackout) navy blue drapes for my son’s bedroom. These are great! First off, they come in a pair which is awesome. A lot of companies sell curtains in single panels and you have to buy two to get a full pair. The material is a nice thick sateen finish and they are back tab. I only used a skinny rod but you could put up to a 2” rod through the back tabs. The drapes make the room pretty dark (but we also have a room darkening shade on the same window). I recommend these curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Room Darkening Curtain, but not quite Blackout
customer_reviews.text: I would not go so far as to call these "Blackout" curtains, however, they do darken the room. I have a large bay window opposite my TV and needed to cut the on screen glare. These curtains performed very well for my needs, but there is a little bit of light transmission. When I purchased the price had been reduced so, if you need absolute blackout, you may consider these and along with adding some blackout material from the local craft store. Which is what I plan to do for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains.
customer_reviews.text: These room darkening blackout curtains truly perform as described. They are large enough to cover the biggest windows but do an amazing job of blocking the light and heat as well. The color seems quite true to how they are pictured and described on the website and there are really no complaints. We would certainly recommend these to anyone who needs a quality set of curtains at a great price. Speaking of price: since this item contains 2 curtains instead of just a single panel it is certainly a better buy than the individual panels sold by other users through-out this and other websites!
customer_reviews.author: D&R

customer_reviews.title: It's curtains for you!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Excellent light control. The tie-backs are well made and color matched perfectly. Highly recommend this product. The heavy textured white sheer is from WalMart (Mainstays) and the curtain rod is the Umbra Twilight double (Amazon). I have upgraded every window in my home to the Umbra Twilight hardware and Mainstays heavy textured sheers. Currently in the process of buying Utopia curtains for the rest of the house. WIll upload more pics when complete.
customer_reviews.author: Ridgeway H

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Curtains!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these curtains along with some "Eclipse" brand panels to hang in my 5th wheel and these Utopia brand ones far surpass the others. These curtains are heavy, well made, cost effective, and relatively true to color (slightly lighter in person). They also came with nicely constructed tie backs that I didn't realize came with. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and wish I had just purchased all Utopia brand curtains for my project. I will definitely remember these curtains if I need heavy weight insulated curtains again. I will say my curtains came with the usual amount of wrinkles but I anticipate the heat in my RV will be enough to work them out after they are hung.
customer_reviews.author: CEZ

customer_reviews.title: Not great for blocking light, arrived ripped and missing tie backs, def not wrinkle free
customer_reviews.text: So before I even opened them, I could see the wear and tear on the fabric right at the top. Put them up anyway since part will be hidden. But these are def not full blackout as my pics show. Also the tie backs were ripped and missing pieces and they def are not wrinkle free as my pics also show. Sad. Prob going to send them back. Too bad too since they were so cheap but I guess you get what you pay for. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Archie’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These curtains with the tie backs are so elegant looking. They block out all the light. I had small white rods and the curtains bent them so I bought more durable curtain rods and they are great. They look much better with the tie backs than without but they are pretty either way. Love them and would highly recommend them. Be careful ironing them, I burned the fabric because my iron was too hot. I ordered another set though because they are really nice curtains but I will not try to iron them again. I will wash and dry them to try to get the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Utopia Bedding Blackout Room Darkening and Thermal Insulating Window Curtains
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these room darkening curtains! They definitely provide an insulating factor keeping the cold air at bay in our NE Ohio winter. Noise reduction isn't great but is noticeable with our moderately traveled rural country road about 70' from my house. I will purchase these curtains again in a different color as my home remodeling continues in the spring. My only complaint is that minimal color selection available with these curtains; I much prefer these curtains versus the grommet loop curtains that are offered in a greater selection of lighter colors..
customer_reviews.author: JDDD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!! I looked at many curtains for my room as I have a lot of windows and needed to block out the sun in the daytime. These block out all of the light on the windows I have them on. Great especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great Curtains Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with these thermal insulated blackout curtains, I ordered the beige, they were a soft yellow beige, heavy soft material, which is exactly what I was looking for in my dining area. They do block out the light. You cannot beat the price for a pair of beautiful curtains. I did wash them before using them, and they came out great, no problem with shrinkage or color. We ordered another pair of curtains in the navy blue, as we were so impressed with the beige ones.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: They also slide along the curtain rod easily without catching
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, gorgeous curtains for an unbeatable price. The color is very true to the pictures and the fabric is very soft and luxurious feeling. They let in very minimal light. They also slide along the curtain rod easily without catching, which is normally one of my biggest pet peeves with curtains. I can't explain enough what a great value these are for the price. They look very expensive but cost half as much as similar ones would cost at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Stevi Wood

customer_reviews.title: I give a 3 rating for poor construction. I purchased for
customer_reviews.text: They are definately black out curtains, made the room dark. I give a 3 rating for poor construction. I purchased for, 2 packs, and they were not the same length. I got a very light tan color and the stitching was black. The color of curtain was as expected but did not look good in my room. I kept them because if the cost of the return.
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Like some other reviewers, I was a bit skeptical at the quality given the low price, but these are FABULOUS! I bought a more expensive set from BB&B & returned them as they didn't block enough light. This set was $45 cheaper, and MUCH more effective. I bought them to cover a sliding glass door that measures 95" across, and although one pair of panels darkens the room to near cave-like (and I bought the light beige color) - I'm considering buying another set. I wish I could just buy one more panel, but I don't see that option in the seller's storefront. Buy these, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great light blocking
customer_reviews.text: Love these. We have a big window next to our bed, and when the sun rises the light comes right through the window and would wake us up early. Once we got these, we were able to sleep in a little bit. They keep the room dark. Our room is poorly insulated, so I don't notice much of a temperature change, however the fact that it blocks the sun from coming in does help keep it cooler. They're a bit long for our window, but we could've adjusted the curtain rod when installing it to help. There are no grommets, the fabric is just folded over and sewn at the top to make a "pocket" that the rod goes through
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B

customer_reviews.title: Very good light blocking, could be better made
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are inexpensive and do block out sunlight very well (purchased 63" in navy). However, they are not fine craftsmanship. This works fine for me as they are in a vacation home with lots of sun and I didn't want to spend very much. One of the panels was not properly hemmed and is shorter on the ends than in the middle. Wrinkling from the packaging is also an issue. I will probably order another set of longer curtains for that same room as I'm happy enough with the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: BodieOne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, affordable, and effective
customer_reviews.text: These are best value, room darkening curtains around. I ordered some more on a Black Friday sale from a large chain retailer where I thought I was getting a better deal. When I compared quality there was nothing really to compare. Hands down, these are more attractive, effective, and higher quality constructed. I now own 2 sets of these and would recommend them to anyone. I especially like the nice tiebacks so I can use the light when I want, and easily darken the room when needed. You won't be disappointed with this purchase, especially when the price point is $20.
customer_reviews.author: Caley G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I was not expecting much at this price but I have to say that my house is staying much cooler and the color on these is so beautiful. The fabric feels so lux and durable. They are wrinkled when you take them out of the package but once you iron them out or steam them they are fine. I love the loop hanging feature that they have instead of the rod pocket or the grommets that you typically see in curtains these days. These are just fantastic! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: Fair ability to blackout light. Not 100%
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the drapery material, POLYESTER, ugh. It catches on my rough hands as I deal with opening (& closing) and trying to make the pleats like in the advert image. The polyester snatches my beautiful sheers (bought here on Amazon) and I have to manually separate them. The seven tabs on backside do not move smoothly over rod. Over time, the rod will become loose at the point where it's screwed into wall. I like the color and length, tiebacks are nice also.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Josleyn

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Not the most effective in terms of being thermal and blocking the sun's heat, but they're pretty good at being room darkening. These curtains are very heavy and have caused my curtain rod to sag. They have no liner and are just one layer of fabric. My living room gets full morning sun and I felt no difference in temperature with or without the curtains as they radiated the heat. I probably wouldn't but them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayce

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: My house is literally pitch black with the curtains closed. I use the curved "blackout" rods. The curtains are a little more burgundy than I wanted but I'm happy. Great quality!! Not super heavy but not light. The stitching is wonderful. Con - the curtains aren't the same length. I double checked my measurements to make sure it wasn't me. But it's not significant. P.S. I can't tell what time it is with the curtains closed. I posted pictures to show.
customer_reviews.author: Cha.aamp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 5 sets of these curtains in dark gray and absolutely love them. I used one set for each small window and 2 sets on the large window. I also put a panel over the window on the front door. There are a lot of outside solar lights throughout the yard which kept my apartment lit up all night making it difficult to sleep. Also my small studio apartment is mostly windows which causes it to really heat up in spite of the AC running continuously. These curtains have solved those issues as well as creating a great movie watching atmosphere. I wholeheartedly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Karmala

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Curtains/Great Value - BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains block light and are pretty too. Silky texture/feel to them. Bought the brown and it's a rich chocolate color. Neighbors all have very bright outdoor lights that shine into the bedroom - through blinds! No light show through with these!! Yeah! Can't Beat the price, for two panels - have looked a lot and this is a very good deal. Plus you get tie backs!! Extremely pleased with the value and quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Beav

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut and make blackout curtains for our camper windows. The material Is very wrinkled but it’s fine for our purpose. We used Velcro to hang behind the camper shades and this works well. Keeps daylight out when you have a little one that will wake at the crack of daylight 😉. We take them off during the day and only use for sleeping purposes. Can’t really say how much heat they keep out but for blackout material it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: Noticed major blemishes immediately after opening.
customer_reviews.text: Major runs in the beige fabric and black spots as well. I'll just buy some in a store as now I'm extremely hesitant to buy online again and appalled that Utopia Bedding would even ship such a defective item. Shame on them!
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you like sleeping in a dark bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these curtains! I purchased them for 2 bedrooms! Most darkening curtains are noisy and made of funky material, these are very soft and do a perfect job of keeping the room dark. The colors are accurate. I purchased navy blue and taupe. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Amie C Cargola

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These curtains do cut down on light coming through my blinds at night, they do not block out very much light during the day. I ordered the biscotti beige as it looked to be a pinkish beige that I thought would look nice with a dark purple bedspread. The biscotti beige is actually golden and much darker in color than I was expecting. Between the quality and the color I will not be keeping these. I guess you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not blackout curtains.
customer_reviews.text: These are not blackout curtains at all. I got the curtains in navy. They are pretty and slightly shimmery, but they do not block light. They are not lined and have kind of a porous texture that lets a lot of light through. I read the reviews and was hopeful but had to return. They are great looking if you don't need blackout, but if you need light blocking or true blackout curtains these are not great for that. Description was misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kelley

customer_reviews.title: False advertising- NOT blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: These reviews are misleading. These are not blackout curtains. They do not have a blackout panel. They are navy curtains and light-reducing. But light still comes through. They are not wrinkle resistant, they came very wrinkled. It's not worth the hassle of returning them, but I do not recommend. They look cheap, and are very disappointing. I'm not going to use them.
customer_reviews.author: catpause

customer_reviews.title: More like 81"
customer_reviews.text: These panels are not 84" long!! I was questioning my sanity after measuring 10 times from rod to floor, knowing that all my previous panels were 84 inches; but when hung these were 3-4 inches too short! After I measured the panel I found out they were the problem. I needed them up asap so I released the hem and made longer. Otherwise the black out quality is wonderful, they are definitely not wrinkle free as I have ironed 2x now and still have wrinkles. Pretty other than being way shorter than advertised
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for night shift workers
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow. If you are thinking about these but aren't sure, buy them. They are worth it. I bought the black curtains. They are as black out as you can get. I'm a night shift worker who hates sleeping in the light...even eye masks don't work 100% for me because of the tiny bit of light they let through. These are amazing. I can go from light-it's-high-noon to pitch-black-could-be-midnight in a second. I'm also hoping these help keep my room cooler as it tends to be the hottest room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color + misleading description
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer sent the wrong color -- I double-checked to ensure that I ordered the navy curtains and I received the olive curtains instead. Like others have mentioned these are just heavy fabric, not lined blackout or thermal curtains, but the fabric isn't THAT heavy. It may block some indirect sunlight but if you, like me, have a streetlamp shining directly into your window, these will not do. They're decent quality for the price if you don't need blackout curtains, but the product description is a lie.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I can not say enough about how impressed I am with these curtains. I honestly wasn’t expecting this kind of quality. I LOVE how they feel and look. They also do NOT have that horrible white backing like most black out curtains. They almost completely filter out all the light except for at the the top of the windows (which I knew they wouldn’t filter that light out). The only downside is it’s a bit complicated to completely get all the wrinkles out but that can easily be overlooked. I absolutely am in love with them and will be buying some for the other bedrooms. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Soft smooth and totally black out the light
customer_reviews.text: These are soft beautiful curtains they do exactly what they say in black on all the lights. I love the fact that they don’t have wrinkles but hang smoothly. My only complain is lack of color variety. There was only one choice for brown and it's not a perfect match to the rooms colors. Still the function rules over the fashion for these light sleeper insomniacs.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Blocks light!
customer_reviews.text: I got the navy color for bedroom windows. Totally blocks out lights from neighbor's motion light which clicks on at odd times of night! Works and the color is perfect. I used the rod pocket instead of loops - pocket is rather large but works fine with the basic flat rods.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 1

customer_reviews.title: absolutley blackout
customer_reviews.text: these curtains are black out i saw the reviews and pics and it is true some light comes on the side but of course i dont have the curtain pinned to the wall and they are soft and have a nice feel / wrinkle free gave a 4 nothing is wrinkle free people of the world and of course had to iron them to get the creases out from the package but this is a great buy
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even need to run these through the dryer. I put them up and let them sit for an hour and they were wrinkle free. Beautiful. I’m so happy. Black blackout curtains are hard to come across for some reason, and these are awesome. I am a fan. It’s not total blackout but it does a good job for what I paid for them and gives me the darkness I want. Photos included are without light on in the room and with the light on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina

customer_reviews.title: They Do the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I have two west-facing windows in my second-story bedroom, and the afternoon sun just blazes through them, making my whole second floor hot despite air conditioning and ceiling fans. I bought these curtains to block the sunlight with the hope of keeping my bedroom cooler. The difference was noticeable in one day! These curtains do the job for blocking light, and they look really nice. I love the feel of the fabric, too.
customer_reviews.author: bitter barren spinster

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These will work great for my purposes. Thick enough to block out the light, but not so heavy as to potentially pull down the bar on which they're hung. Material feels soft to the touch. I washed them before hanging as I always do when I get new blankets, towels, linens, etc and they held up nicely. No complaints. Now, the true test..... let's see if they truly block out the morning sun! (I'll update this if they fail; if no update, I'm still sleeping...and very happy).
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I work from 1am to 9am, so I usually sleep during the day. These curtains have let my sleep actually become restful, as they not only block out most of the light, but also a lot of sound. My room even feels warmer! The curtains are also great quality and a nicer material than what I was expecting for the price. I'm very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice on my part
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for new curtains in my living space. We purchased some gray leather furniture so I wanted to get some curtains to match. Spent a few weeks searching, reading reviews, etc. and I settled on these curtains and I'm so happy I did. They are even better than I expected. They totally block out light. Would definitely purchase more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna, FL

customer_reviews.title: Probably wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great material–nice and heavy. Unfortunately, it is not consistent throughout and allows for sunlight to enter in scattered, dotted patterns throughout the panels. The curtains also don’t measure to their true size: one measures 61” and the other 62”; luckily with the way we arranged the panels on our 47” window, you can’t really tell since they’re bunched up. I also had to return the first package for a variety of reasons: loops not sewn, tie-backs missing, and sun-damage–very obviously used. So the descriptions up there are for the second package I ended up keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: I have migraines which is why I bought them so that when I need a very dark room when I’m having photosensitivity I can hide from the light. They do a possible job. They are not perfect, but they’re pretty darn good. Light still comes in from the top so if you wanted to be completely dark pay tension to your curtain rod choice or how do you mount them to the wall
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Murray redhead, gamer, Humanitarian, creator of beautiful things

customer_reviews.title: Make the room dark
customer_reviews.text: I am very light sensitive and live in Phoenix where the sun comes up early and shines very bright. These curtains actually do black out the room as well as help with keeping it cooler. They are wrinkle free and look really nice. I purchased the white ones and was a little concerned just because they are so white. They have not picked up any dirt or finger prints. I've had them a couple months now and am extremely happy
customer_reviews.author: Psnyder

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Incredible. Best blackout curtains I've ever had. It takes only 1 piece to cover my bedroom window. They are not for showing the curtain rod, as their image demonstrates. Perfect. I have had these for 4 months and still blackout. May buy more for the future just to have in storage (like I do the second panel until I have a bigger window or stronger curtain rod) in case they are no longer sold. Measurements are accurate. It is good to note that my curtain rod only sticks out about 1.5 inches from the wall. Very well done.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: BLACKout
customer_reviews.text: These are the ULTIMATE black out curtains. Our window is huge and is in direct sunlight in the afternoon noon. This causes our master bedroom to be 5-10 degrees warmer than any other room. My husband does shift work so he needs the room to be dark during the brightest times of the day. These curtains make it look like midnight in our room as well as regulates the temperature
customer_reviews.author: Jeslyn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few of these curtains and they are good quality the colors are like the pictures and the links are as they say and they are good quality I love them and will continue to order my curtains from them :)
customer_reviews.author: L Buys

customer_reviews.title: Work well but had to iron out wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thermal and light blocking properties. Examine your curtains immediately to see if there are stains. I had to return 1 set and another had a stain that I did not see until I hung it up. Also, they are very wrinkled. Another reviewer mentioned washing and then drying to remove wrinkles. This did not help me. I had to IRON them. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah S

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 pairs, all had holes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the material and the good of darkening job they do. I am displeased that the 3 packets I bought came with holes. I was in urgent need of curtains for my son’s room so to me returning or exchanging wasn’t an option. They still work well and do a great job of darkening, if you are not looking for “imperfections” you won’t notice. I gave two stars because it is unpleasant buying something just to find it is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Love these curtains.
customer_reviews.text: Every window in our house has these curtains. We had one window that didn't have these curtains for a while in winter and you could tell a stark difference in temperature insulation just by being near them. They block light really well. The only downside is if you are looking for something that's not a solid color you're out of luck (at the time of writing this). The colors are good and almost identical to the factory images.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blackout curtains with tie backs
customer_reviews.text: These blackout curtains work quite well. You can hang them in two ways, either looping it over the rod or slotting it into the rod (as you like!). They look great but they could do with some simple ironing before putting up. Don't be lazy like me! Material of the curtain is thick and good. Comes with matching tie-backs, which you could get adhesive hooks to hang on to. I paired it with theand they work great together.
customer_reviews.author: duepeace

customer_reviews.title: Received two different curtains
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I received two very different blackout curtains in this package. The difference isn't enough to go through the process of the exchange, but it is definitely noticeable. One curtain is fully closed where the curtain rod goes through, and one has eight sections for it to go through (if that makes any sense). Definitely unhappy, but the curtains look fine and block light out.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome thick suede like fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something warm for the window in our bedroom to keep the Colorado winter at bay. So far it has kept our room warmer during the last snowstorm than our previous black out curtains. I love the fact that I ran it through the dryer really quickly and it has pulled out all the packaging wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: paula callahan

customer_reviews.title: Nice curtains!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric. The material has a very smooth texture. It blocks the light nicely in my bedroom. However, the length of the curtains seem to vary depending on the color. I always like to mix and match colors. If the curtains are supposed to be the same length one curtain should not be longer than the other. But, it appears that the beige colored curtain is longer than the navy blue ones. So, I've decided to give it 4 stars. UPDATE: 2/16/17 I bought the burgundy curtains for my livingroom and used a different rod with a support hook in the center. I absolutely love the look, so I upgraded the rating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps reduce the heat from the windows.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice curtains. They have definitely helped reduce the heat in our living room and it’s now very dark also. Can’t say much about noise though since I live in a quiet neighborhood but I think they are pretty great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Luckey

customer_reviews.title: Very good curtains
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I didn't listen to the negative reviews. I bought these in black and these are great! My husband sometimes works overnights and he needs to sleep during the day. They are not 100% total black out but if you expect that, you should probably pay the price for that. These are almost black out curtains. Probably 90% of the light is not coming through the window so I am very happy with what we paid for!
customer_reviews.author: gregory herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great quality curtains!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I fell in love with these curtains! They are everything. My room does not have a working vent, so in the summer time I have to use a fan and in the winter I have to use extra blankets. When I received these curtains and put them up, I noticed a change in temperature of the room. It was much cooler than before. The cool air from the fan actually stays in the room and the hot air stays out. I will be purchasing more for Christmas gifts to my friends and family that complain about the light when they're asleep or the temperature of the room.
customer_reviews.author: LaKaisha Abney

customer_reviews.title: Great find, but contains non-adhesive tiebacks
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit wrinkly (although I haven't washed it to be honest) but so far this has cut out most of the light going into my room; there is some light coming around the sides but that's to be expected. It hasn't really decreased the sound much, but for the price point this is a great find. One minor complaint is that the tie backs are not adhesive. I ended up purchasing some 3M hooks from Target, putting them behind the curtain, and hanging the tiebacks on them. Seems to be working so far.
customer_reviews.author: OneMoreThing

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with curtains than I am with these. They are thick and soft and they block out all light. I have them on the wide flat wrap-a-round curtain rods that fit in the rod cuffs. I thought they would let light in/out at the top but they don't. I put them up and turned the lights on at night and you could see no light from outside. I can't say if the lighter colors would be light proof but these dark ones are for sure. I will buy these when I decide to re-curtain other windows.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: **double panel. What I was looking for, exactly as pictured. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Soft nice material. Few wrinkles in folds but came out after being hung. Cannot see sun through them! Great rod pocket options, easier to move curtain and manuver curtain around brackets with the straps. Also comes with tie backs and is double panels. Exactly what I was looking for. The olive color is as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light blocking curtains
customer_reviews.text: I just started working nights and realized I need to block more of the light coming into my bedroom, so I can sleep during the day. I already had expensive “black out” curtains from bed bath and beyond, but they weren’t blocking nearly enough light. I liked the price point on these Utopia curtains, $16 is really reasonable. And I’m blown away by the quality. They really work as advertised, they keep my bedroom very dark during the day. I liked them so much I ordered another set right away to cover the rest of the windows in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for night shifts.
customer_reviews.text: For anyone that works noghtahifts or rotating shifts, you know that blocking out every single photon of light is crucial to getting some sleep during the day, and a lot of in-store curtains are expenive, only sell one panel, and don’t do any better than regular sheer curtains. Let me assure you - THESE DO THE TRICK!!! Very plain, so the match any decor but most importantly? My house is pitch black during the day. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are soft, heavy curtains that definitely seem to block a lot of light. I bought them to use in a pop-up camper and haven’t tested them out for sleeping yet, but I did hold them up to a sunny window and was impressed with the amount of light they blocked. I’m thinking about ordering more for my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Blackout Curtains
customer_reviews.text: I started with the Utopia brand because I was offered a discount by the company years ago. Now, I order them simply because the value I receive for the price point is better than any other I have purchased. Their blackout curtains are perfect for my husband who works 3rd shift and needs sleep in the daytime. We also ended up ordering them for our Living Room in our new house. It faces the side of the home that gets the most sun so we need them during the Summer to keep the room cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Disario

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love thes curtains! They definitely block out all the light and the fabric is still elegant. The price point is GREAT for what you get. (I purchased a similar set off Wayfair for double the cost, and these do JUST as good of a job to block out the light). I figured the more you pay the better the product but seriously this is not the case with these curtains.
customer_reviews.author: nichole

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has an 8 year old son and he's afraid to sleep alone. There's a lamppost right outside his bedroom window, so he sees shadows and really get's terrified. I bought these black out curtains to stop any light from coming in and they work great. Not only that, they're very well made. Good quality and great price! I would definitely buy these again and refer these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love these curtains
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specific curtains because I have previously purchased them in other colors for guest bedroom and office. They are thick and do block the light for sensitive sleepers or those night shift workers. They do decrease drafts and feel like quality. Colors are very nice as I have red, gray and sand. Sewing is well done.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: An easy fix for our windows
customer_reviews.text: Since we've been thinking about selling our home, we didn't want to invest a fortune in new curtains. But the old ones definitely needed an update. We searched the stores. We searched online. We finally settled on these for the price (and Amazon Prime's return policy). They won't be going back. They fit well and look pretty darned good. The price we couldn't match anywhere. Oh, and not sure why there are some complaints that they don't block enough light. The set we bought block the light significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice curtains
customer_reviews.text: Like these curtains. I put them up in my van between the cab and back where I sleep on camping trips...for privacy, to defer the light, and also the heat when it gets warmer. My only complaint is one panel was extremely wrinkled at the bottom. I sprayed with water, tugged, pulled...and wrinkles didn't budge. Next time I do laundry, I will try putting them in the dryer with wet clothes. But overall, very nice and durable and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Meisha4

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the room dark
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains. I have some for our bedrooms and now the dining room. I am able to make the room dark if needed or use the curtain ties to hold back the curtains some. The sun is harsh here being over a mile high, having the curtains helps with temperature control in a winter and summer. The price is very good for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Mom.of.3

customer_reviews.title: Not "Blackout" but great curtains
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are really nice quality. They are very velevety soft to the touch and are pretty heavy. I ordered the gray and they are a little darker than I was expecting, but sill work with my decor. You can put the rod through the whole curtain or through loops on the back. They pleat and hang nicely. As much as I like these curtains, I can only give 4 stars because they are not "blackout". They do darken the room a lot but you can still see the sunlight lines between the shades. They darken the room plenty for me, but for someone that wants true "blackout" you may want to add a sheer behind or get another curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Kellee

customer_reviews.title: Look nice! Very Dark!
customer_reviews.text: We love these black out curtains! They are the same color on both sides, so they look nice from the inside and the outside. The color is a little more of a hot chocolate brown than the picture shows. (Kind of lighter with a very very small touch of red.) They work perfectly in our master, but did not match the darker shades of brown in our living room. Would order again if the color was right!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: loved them enough to buy another pair
customer_reviews.text: this was the 4th pair of curtains i've purchased from Utopia but the first pair with the back tab instead of the rings. wanted something a bit more formal looking for my living room. ordered the biscotti and the color is perfect for my room and furniture. purchased a send pair to use on the windows with the a/c units. this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: NLA

customer_reviews.title: Vampires and 3rd Shifters a must have!
customer_reviews.text: They work great, the sun rises on this side of the home so having the curtains does help with keeping the temperature down by about 10 degrees. Which is perfect for my needs, especially seeing as I have a computer running 24/7. They just barely fit my span (dual windows) but that was my fault seeing I was looking for something within my budget at the time. The thickness I assume falls into the price of these, the wind does cause them to flow about but some velcro in key spots solved that. I work 12am - 8am so total darkness is a must! I shall be shopping this company again, my girlfriend needs them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: There’s no light that comes thru the curtains so if you want 100% blackout, you’ll have to tape the edges down. That’s the only place light gets thru. Stylish and soft curtains. Bought for a bedroom and my living room so I can watch tv without a glare.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - darker colors are the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in chocolate for my living room and black for my bedroom. They are awesome. I noticed some reviews said the light still came in thru the curtains but I don't have that problem - maybe because I picked the darker colors. The black ones I bought actually were to replace curtains from a different brand that weren't wide enough for my windows. That brand was more expensive and I have to say that these look and feel better. Not sure how I'm going to put up the ties that come with it but I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tab-Okay

customer_reviews.title: Great all around.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fantastic, they are very heavy and look lovely. My room is pitch black and they make a huge difference in temperature. We live in a 90 year old home with beautiful original windows but they let in a lot of cold air, these have made a notable difference in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fades and snags
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with quality of fabric, color drastically faded after 5 months of hanging, fabric also was very easily snagged. Blocked out temperature well. Light was so so. Had to order new curtains to replace these after 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Somer

customer_reviews.title: Black0 out ability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cut into smaller pieces to fit my Sprinter van. Added snaps to it and it is awesome. From outside at night you cannot tell there is any light or anyone inside. Exactly what I wanted. Will order another set for the front 3 windows.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Really effective on drafty window.
customer_reviews.text: These are really heavy duty. They look great. We use them over a drafty window in our apartment in a room that never seemed to warm up. These truly did the trick to my surprise. Would definitely recommend. They block out light really well too.
customer_reviews.author: Clam Manson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These were far better than I expected. I couldn't find anything in the stores in the size I needed anywhere near this price. I really like the back tabs, that are much easier to open than the grommets, which kept getting stuck on the place where the rods connect because my window is wide and needed a rod extender. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robbi A. Magley

customer_reviews.title: and these look great and are heavy
customer_reviews.text: I needed new drapes,and these look great and are heavy. They are a bit wrinkly out of the packaging, I am going to give it a few more days and then throw them in the wash to try and fix that. These were exactly as described, the olive ones I have ordered twice and received the grommet top ones both times - frustrating especially when I have these chocolate ones and they are exactly what I wanted! Sending back the olive ones twice was easy since it was fulfilled by Amazon, so not a huge deal but still annoying. Looks like I might have to order more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Saddith

customer_reviews.title: Total Black Out
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains. They really do block the light out. You won't be able to see your hand in front of your face. They were just the right length I wanted. The fabric has some weight to it and feels smooth. I think it's polyester.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Tea

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is nicer than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Curtains have black out feature without the ugly back lining. Material is a thick navy sateen type fabric which has a rich look to them. I also liked the rear loops that are not visible. They look different hanging on rod than tab tops or ring tab. The tie backs are smaller than I hoped but when in use they give a sleek clean and neat look to the window decor. Overall very happy with the buy. Dimensions and pictures are as described.
customer_reviews.author: woohoo girl

customer_reviews.title: A total blackout!  Soft and thick fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, really blocks out the light! My bedroom is a total blackout, almost like a photographer's dark room. I have floor-length room-darkening curtains in my bedroom but the radiator is under the window, so I couldn't close the curtains in the winter. I bought these shorter ones and put them on the inside of the double-rod, and just close these shorter ones when I go to bed. These are much thicker than my more decorative room-darkening curtains! Very soft too. I like the fabric. I may order more just to use the fabric for other projects. This also came with tiebacks.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good curtains, but missing a loop for the curtain rod to pass through
customer_reviews.text: One of the loops that go around the curtain rod is missing. I ordered 3 sets of the same curtains, but only one single curtain is missing a loop so I know it’s a manufacturing defect. I’m hoping the seller or manufacturer is able to send a replacement because that section just hangs away from the roof and it’s definitely noticeable because it’s on the end. I did email the manufacturer already. Other than that, I love the length and the look, they seem petty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Disanto

customer_reviews.title: Nice and dark for daytime sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: I work night shift and needed blackout curtains to sleep during the day. I bought a set of the black curtains and pinned them around the molding of my windows, over a set of closed mini blinds. Together they block out light very well. It is VERY DARK. If they were on a curtain rod, light would bleed in from the gaps at the top and sides, but since they are essentially flat against the window frame, it's perfectly dark! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: g m

customer_reviews.title: Blackout room darkening curtains.
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are thick for light blocking but not heavy. They have a luxurious shine to the material which is the same on the front and back. They are very well made with a 4' hem and 1 ' sides that make them look expensive. I ordered the 63' for a girl's room. The only thing that would make them more appealing would be grommets for hanging rather than the 7 back slits or regular curtain slot. This is stated in the description and because of the reviews I bought them anyway, glad I did. I love the extra wide width of each panel too. You can't go wrong with these. They are very nice!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Garrett

customer_reviews.title: They darken the room adequately and lay nicely. There was some red and gold threads on ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought4 packages and sewed two panels together for wider windows. They darken the room adequately and lay nicely. There was some red and gold threads on them, but i removed the threads before using the drapes. For the price they are well made and the beltloop like hangers on the back help the panels lay nicely. Overall, I am pleased with the way they came out and it was an inexpensive way to get wider drapes. I would recommend them to my friends. the fabric is soft and the color, navy blue, is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Petzold

customer_reviews.title: I am not even going to lie, I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not even going to lie, I was nervous about these being so cheap, not only that but ordering the olive color as well because I was hoping to match our bedding. These are well worth the money, the color is soft so its not too much and I cant even tell in the morning that the sun is out. I will deff be buying these for the rest of our house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as hoped....
customer_reviews.text: Have mixed feeling about product. Curtains look nice hanging, but I ordered 2 sets & each set came with different looking tiebacks & very short, so I ended up buying additional 4 rope tiebacks to use instead. Wasn’t happy about that. I also question energy efficiency as all my other thermal curtains have a double layer that includes a backing but this is single heavy layer curtain. For the price, i kept curtains & will see how well they do.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN

customer_reviews.title: The light blocking is excellent. A bright sunny day out and the curtains ...
customer_reviews.text: These curtains were just what I was looking for. My living room feels warmer at night which saves on my natural gas bill. The light blocking is excellent. A bright sunny day out and the curtains were closed. The room remained shaded almost like twilight. One thing that I am particularly appreciative of is the match of the color. I always hesitate to by things things like this online because the picture isn't always true to the actual color. No worries with these in fact I plan to by at least two more sets for other rooms. I would highly recommend the product and the shipping was right on time so I had them when I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: They look beautiful. I had the window open in that room ...
customer_reviews.text: Hung these up under an arch between rooms (as a divider for privacy). They look beautiful. I had the window open in that room for air - when I went into the room it was so cool & refreshing compared to rest of the house that was stifling warm. These curtains do a great job of controlling the temperature as the rest of the house did not cool down. I recommend these curtains.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Blackout?  Not!
customer_reviews.text: There ain't nuthin blackout about these curtains! You will be disappointed if you are counting on that. Also, they are approximately 3 inches shorter than they should be. And, to top it off, there were stains on them. But other than that, everything was perfect, lol 😂
customer_reviews.author: Nomy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: They blackout the lights.
customer_reviews.text: I love these blackout curtains. They keep the room dark all day and night. My husband is in the navy so when he comes home from watch and he needs to sleep even if it’s day time he can. I have the black ones in our bedrooms and we can literally sleep all day with these.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Davis

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding 2 Panels Blackout Curtains, W52 x L84 Inches, Navy, Thermal Insulated Window Draperies - 7 Back Loops per Panel - 2 Tie Backs Included
feature_bullets: BLACKOUT CURTAIN SET - Set includes 2 panels each measuring 52 inches wide by 84 inches long, covering a total area of 104 by 84 inches; 7 back loops per panel and 2 matching tie backs included
EASY TO INSTALL - Both loop and rod pocket style per panel each with a 1.6 inch inner diameter makes it easy to install
HEM-STITCH - Same material back as of front; top and bottom hem of 4 inches wide and side hem of 1 inch wide makes it more elegant to look
THERMAL TOP DESIGN - Thermal top makes it not only energy efficient but can block up to 99 percent of light and filter approximately 60 percent of the outside noise from entering the room
MACHINE WASH - Machine wash on cold, tumble dry on low

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,589 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
